mapper.select: SELECT id_card as idCard, name, gender, password, birth_date as birthDate, family_phone as familyPhone, is_in as isIn, balance FROM user WHERE id_card = #{idCard}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET name = #{et.name}, gender = #{et.gender}, password = #{et.password}, birth_date = #{et.birthDate}, family_phone = #{et.familyPhone}, is_in = #{et.isIn}, balance = #{et.balance} WHERE id_card = #{et.idCard}
